original_text: They have taken some of their daughters as wives for themselves and their sons, and have mingled the holy race with the peoples around them. And the leaders and officials have led the way in this unfaithfulness.”
korean_text: 그들의 딸을 맞이하여 아내와 며느리로 삼아 거룩한 자손이 그 지방 사람들과 서로 섞이게 하는데 방백들과 고관들이 이 죄에 더욱 으뜸이 되었다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: They have taken some of their daughters as wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기들의 딸 중 일부를 아내로 삼았고

sentences.original_text: and have mingled the holy race
have led the way in this unfaithfulness
